***Data Over Time***
```{r categories, echo=FALSE, fig.show='hold', fig.width=10, fig.height=4, cache=FALSE}
plot <- ggplot(dateTable, aes(recorded_date, cumulativeSum)) 
plot <- plot + geom_line(colour = "blue", size = rel(1.3))
plot <- plot + labs(title = "Raw Data Points Acquired Over Time", x = "Date", 
                      y = "Number of Points Acquired to Date")
plot <- plot + theme(axis.title = element_text(size = rel(1.5)), 
                       plot.title = element_text(size = rel(2)),
                       axis.text = element_text(size = rel(1.3)))
plot
```
